name: The Floow
goal: We are a Telematics and vehicle safety analysis company with a truly global reach based in Sheffield, North of England. Our unique technologies, insights and digital products help market leaders in insurance and automotive industries across the world bring the latest telematics technologies to their customers.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Motor Insurance Directive

General Data Protection Regulation

Data Ethics and AI regulatory controls

Horizon Research Programme
